meta.description: Optimize the number of wagons used to transport ore to the surface.

sets.name: WAGON_TYPES
sets.description: Types of wagons used for transporting ore.

params.name: capacity
params.description: Capacity of each type of wagon in units of ore.

params.name: ore_requirement
params.description: Total units of ore that need to be transported to the surface.

vars.name: num_wagons
vars.description: Number of wagons of each type used.

objective.name: min_total_wagons
objective.description: Minimize the total number of wagons used.

constraints.name: ore_transport_requirement
constraints.description: Ensure at least 2000 units of ore are transported.

constraints.name: small_wagon_ratio
constraints.description: The number of small wagons must be at least twice the number of large wagons.

constraints.name: min_large_wagons
constraints.description: At least 10 large wagons must be used.
